other_tests.findings: Granulation tissue with acid-fast rods found.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Lumbar sacral abscess disappeared slowly, and the patient has otherwise been healthy.

other_tests.findings: Acid-fast rods isolated from bone tissue.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 4 years of treatment, it was still possible to obtain M. avium-intracellulare complex.

other_tests.findings: Positive reaction with diameter of 5 mm, vesicular after 12 months.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The reaction progressed from 5 mm to vesicular after 12 months.
